src:
Menpora Bakal Buka Secara Resmi Porwil ke X se Sumatera di Bengkulu
01 Nov 2019, 19:29 by Roki EP


Menpora Bakal Buka Secara Resmi Porwil ke X se Sumatera di Bengkulu

KBRN, Bengkulu : Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga (Menpora) Republik Indonesia Zainudin Amali direncanakan akan membuka secara resmi pelaksanaan Pekan Olahraga Wilayah (Porwil) ke X se Sumatera, yang dipusatkan di Stadion Semarak Sawah Lebar Bengkulu, pada Sabtu, (2/11/2019) besok.
“Insya Allah Menpora bakal hadir secara langsung membuka Porwil ke X se Sumatera di Bengkulu yang akan berlangsung dari tanggal 3 sampai 9 November nanti,” ungkap Gubernur Bengkulu Rohidin Mersyah, sesaat usai menyambut api abadi Torch Relay Porwil ke 10 se Sumatera di Gedung Balai Raya Semarak Bengkulu.
Gubernur Rohidin mengatakan, dalam pembukaan Porwil ke X dengan Bengkulu sebagai tuan rumah akan berlangsung spektakuler dan meriah, namun tetap mengedepankan etnis lokal Bengkulu dengan berbagai macam karakteristik alam berupa nyanyian dan tarian.
Selain itu juga akan dihibur oleh artis ibukota, Virza, Citra Scholastika, Riska Meilyanti, Nirwana, colosal musik dol, tari kolosal dan pesta kembang api.
“Saya mengajak kepada seluruh masyarakat Bengkulu untuk dapat bersama-sama menyaksikannya secara langsung dan diharapkan event olahraga tingkat nasional ini bisa berjalan dengan baik dan sukses,” kata Gubernur, pada Jumat (1/11/2019) sore.
Lebih jauh untuk prosesi penutupan Porwil ke X se Sumatera di Bengkulu yang akan berlangsung pada 9 November 2019, dipusatkan di halaman gedung Balai Raya Semarak Bengkulu.
“Dalam acara penutupan tetap ada seremonial sekaligus syukuran nantinya atas harapan prestasi besar yang ditunjukan dari perolehan medali dari para atlit dari Bengkulu dan sukses dalam pelaksanaannya, termasuk dampak ekonominya bagi masyarakat Provinsi Bengkulu,” pungkas Rohidin.
text:
Menpora Will Officially Open Regional Offices to X in Sumatra in Bengkulu
Nov 01 2019, 19:29 by Roki EP


Menpora Will Officially Open Regional Offices to X in Sumatra in Bengkulu

KBRN, Bengkulu: Minister of Youth and Sports (Menpora) of the Republic of Indonesia Zainudin Amali is planned to officially open the X Regional Sports Week (Porwil) throughout Sumatra, which is centered at Semarak Sawah Lebar Bengkulu Stadium, on Saturday (11/02/2019) ) tomorrow.
"Insya Allah, the Menpora will be present to directly open the X Regional Office of Sumatra in Bengkulu, which will take place from November 3 to 9," said Bengkulu Governor Rohidin Mersyah, shortly after welcoming the eternal fire of the 10th Regional Relay Torch Relay in Sumatra in the Balai Raya Building Lively Bengkulu.
Governor Rohidin said, in the opening of the X Regional Porwil with Bengkulu as the host will take place spectacular and lively, but still prioritize Bengkulu local ethnicity with a variety of natural characteristics in the form of singing and dancing.
It will also be entertained by capital artists, Virza, Citra Scholastika, Riska Meilyanti, Nirvana, colosal dol music, colossal dance and fireworks parties.
"I invite all the people of Bengkulu to be able to jointly witness it firsthand and hopefully this national level sporting event can run well and be successful," said the Governor, on Friday (11/01/2019) afternoon.
Furthermore, the procession to close the Regional X to Sumatra in Bengkulu, which will take place on November 9, 2019, will be centered in the courtyard of the Balai Raya Semarak Bengkulu building.
"In the closing ceremony there will be a ceremonial as well as thanksgiving later on the hopes of great achievements shown from the acquisition of medals from athletes from Bengkulu and success in their implementation, including the economic impact on the people of Bengkulu Province," concluded Rohidin.
